title: 主格與受格代名詞練習
desc: 練習使用主格和受格代名詞，了解它們在句子中的正確位置與用法。
prompt_en: Please replace the noun in the sentence with the correct subject or object pronoun.
prompt_zh: 請將句子中的名詞替換成正確的主格或受格代名詞。
sample_questions: I saw John and Mary yesterday. I talked to ___ and ___.
She gave the book to Peter. → She gave the book to ___.

title: 所有格代名詞練習
desc: 練習使用所有格代名詞來表示所有權，並區分所有格形容詞與所有格代名詞。
prompt_en: Fill in the blanks with the correct possessive pronoun or possessive adjective.
prompt_zh: 請填入正確的所有格代名詞或所有格形容詞。
sample_questions: This is my book. That one is ___.
Is this your pen? No, it's ___.

title: 代名詞改錯練習
desc: 找出句子中代名詞使用錯誤的地方並加以修正。
prompt_en: Identify and correct the pronoun errors in the following sentences.
prompt_zh: 找出以下句子中代名詞的錯誤並修正。
sample_questions: Her and me went to the park.

title: 代名詞填空練習
desc: 根據句意填入適當的代名詞，練習主格、受格與所有格的用法。
prompt_en: Fill in the blanks with the correct pronouns (subject, object, or possessive).
prompt_zh: 根據句意填入正確的代名詞（主格、受格或所有格）。
sample_questions: This is not my bag; it's ___.

title: 代名詞情境對話練習
desc: 透過模擬對話練習代名詞的正確使用，提升口語表達能力。
prompt_en: Engage in a conversation using pronouns correctly based on the given scenario.
prompt_zh: 根據情境進行對話，正確使用代名詞。
sample_questions: Scenario: Introducing your friend to someone. Use pronouns to describe your friend.
Scenario: Talking about your family members using possessive pronouns.
Scenario: Asking for help and referring to yourself and others with correct pronouns.
